## Curve3.CreateCubicBezier() method

Returns a Curve3 object along a Cubic Bezier curve : http://doc.babylonjs.com/tutorials/How\_to\_use\_Curve3\#cubic-bezier-curve

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static CreateCubicBezier(v0: Vector3, v1: Vector3, v2: Vector3, v3: Vector3, nbPoints: number): Curve3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v0 | <code>Vector3</code> | (Vector3) the origin point of the Cubic Bezier |
|  v1 | <code>Vector3</code> | (Vector3) the first control point |
|  v2 | <code>Vector3</code> | (Vector3) the second control point |
|  v3 | <code>Vector3</code> | (Vector3) the end point of the Cubic Bezier |
|  nbPoints | <code>number</code> | (integer) the wanted number of points in the curve |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Curve3`

the created Curve3
